comments:
Build ID: I20070323-1616
CDT: 4.0-M6

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Launch an eclipse application in debug mode and switch to debug perspective
2. Select org.eclipse.equinox.Launcher.main
3. Right click to bring up contextmenu and select Properties
4. An error message dialog pops up, and then the Properties dialog come up but now there are no ways to close this dialog. 

I had to use task manager to kill the host eclipse process.

More information:
Here is the NullPointerException log:

It is me too.
If I open properies of any C/C++ files then click 'C/C++ ToolChain edit' in the properties dialog, Error to me as "An error has occurred. See error log for more details."

My environment: Windows / Eclipse 3.3 M6 Europa / CDT 4.0 M6
                on Any C/C++ Project
